How to Use the Client Log Page

Follow these simple steps to log your entry and exit using the Client Log system.

Process Flow

  1. Start the Camera: Click the "Start Camera" button to activate your device's camera.
  2. Scan Your Face: Position your face within the camera view and ensure good lighting for accurate recognition.
  3. Verify Identification: Wait for the system to identify you. Check that your name appears correctly in the "Match" section. If incorrect, use the "Override" button to manually select or enter your details.
  4. Select Purpose(s): Choose one or more purposes for your visit from the checkboxes (e.g., Receive Document/s Requested, Submit Document/s, etc.).
  5. Type Additional Information: Provide specific details such as the document name or the person you are visiting.
  6. Click "Time In": Press the "Time In" button to record your entry. You will hear a success sound and see a confirmation message.
  7. Log Out When Leaving: When you are ready to leave, find your entry in the "Client Logs" section on the right and click the "Logout" button next to your name.
Done! Your visit has been successfully logged.

Additional Tips

  • Ensure your face is clearly visible and well-lit for better recognition.
  • If the camera doesn't recognize you, use the "Override" feature to manually enter your information.
  • All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are required.
  • You can only log out if you are currently logged in (shown in the "Client Logs" section).
